column1: [KEEP THIS LINE] [must have at least 1 held item, 1 non-held item]

column14:
Share a pic of a random Pokemon. You and a random opponent guess its catch rate. If you're closer/tied, earn $30.
TELL YOUR OPPONENT: catch rate is a number 3-255, usually a multiple of 5.
Start a 1-Round subgame of Roguelike Showdown. If you win, you gain all of your Pokemon in the subgame as Level 1 Pokemon, here, in EXTRA SLOT(S). If you lose, refund this purchase!
